item.title: Contact
item.description: I’m around in many places. But it’s easy enough to find my in the following Email - contact@shermanrose.uk Twitter - @hiNiko Discord - niko?#7438

item.title: Sherman Rose
item.description: Hi, I’m Sherman! I write and work on programs for a living. When I’m not doing that, I’m probably making music or playing games. I could go on but why don’t you have a look around the site to see more of what I have been up to. Cheers Sherman Rose
